issue.title: [Python] Improve repr of pyarrow.compute.FunctionOptions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13236](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13236). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-13025 added a ToString which is now used in the Python repr. This adds the specified parameters nicely, but I would be useful to still include the name of the class as well:

```Java

In [9]: pc.TrimOptions("a")
Out[9]: {characters="a"}
```
